name: Get Out (itch) (Navaneetthedev)
description: Get Out is a game where you are locked in a room with a lots of other zombies .You have two guns to kill them .There is also a health-bar representing your health  if you come in contact with them for 10 times you will die . If you reach the white door then you will will.This game will work with all the versions of windows except for the versions older than windows 7.
